thread.title: Grainne
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Grainne

author: Grainne
title: Grainne
text: My order arrived 5 days after I ordered it which was fine. One small gripe, as I was out when the courier came it was left with a neighbour, which was fine except I noticed that my phone number was on the bar coded address which breaches some privacy regulations I would think? Would have been happier if it hadn't be available to anyone who looked at the label. Boots are lovely though, I'm very happy with them. Thanks.
